detaileddescription.para:
Values:
An unsigned integer value. [default: 0]

Values:
1: enable, generate model for assertions only
2: enable, generate model for all created terms
0: disable [default]

simplesect.para: This option cannot be enabled in combination with option EVALUE(PP_UNCONSTRAINED_OPTIMIZATION.

detaileddescription.para:
Values:
1: enable
0: disable [default]

Values:
1: enable
0: disable [default]

Values:
An unsigned integer value. [default: 0]

Values:
An unsigned integer value <= 4. [default: 0]

Values:
bitblast: The classical bit-blasting approach. [default]
prop: Propagation-based local search (sat only).
preprop: Sequential portfolio combination of bit-blasting and propagation-based local search.

Values:
0: no rewriting
1: term level rewriting
2: term level rewriting and basic preprocessing
3: term level rewriting and full preprocessing [default]

simplesect.para: Configuring the rewrite level after terms have been created is not allowed.
This is an expert option to configure rewriting.

detaileddescription.para:
Values:
cadical: CaDiCaL [default]
cms: CryptoMiniSat
gimsatul: Gimsatul
kissat: Kissat
lingeling: Lingeling
Parser only option. Only effective when an SMT2 input file is parsed.

Values:
1: enable
0: disable [default]

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Constant bits.

detaileddescription.para: Configure constant bit propagation (requries bit-blasting to AIG).

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Infer bounds for inequalities for value computation.

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, infer bounds for value computation for inequalities based on satisfied top level inequalities.

Values:
1: enable
0: disable [default]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Number of propagations.

detaileddescription.para: Configure the number of propagations used as a limit for the propagation-based local search solver engine. No limit if 0.

Values:
An unsigned integer value. [default: 0]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Number of updates.

detaileddescription.para: Configure the number of model value updates used as a limit for the propagation-based local search solver engine. No limit if 0.

Values:
An unsigned integer value. [default: 0]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Path selection.

detaileddescription.para: Configure mode for path selection.

Values:
essential: Select path based on essential inputs. [default]
random: Select path randomly.

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Probability for selecting random input.

detaileddescription.para: Configure the probability with which to select a random input instead of an essential input when selecting the path.

Values:
An unsigned integer value <= 1000 (= 100%). [default: 0]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Probability for inverse values.

detaileddescription.para: Configure the probability with which to choose an inverse value over a consistent value when aninverse value exists.

Values:
An unsigned integer value <= 1000 (= 100%). [default: 990]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Value computation for sign extension.

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, detect sign extension operations (are rewritten on construction) and use value computation for sign extension.

Values:
1: enable
0: disable [default]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

para.bold: Propagation-based local search solver engine: Local search specific normalization.

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, perform normalizations for local search, on the local search layer (does not affect node layer).

Values:
1: enable
0: disable [default]

simplesect.para: This is an expert option to configure the prop solver engine.

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, applies all enabled preprocessing passes.

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable
When enabled, substitutes contradicting nodes of kind #BV_AND with zero.

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

para.bold: Preprocessing: Eliminate bit-vector extracts on bit-vector constants

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, eliminates bit-vector extracts on constants.

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable
When enabled, substitutes assertions that occur as sub-expression in the formula with their respective Boolean value.

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

para.bold: Preprocessing: Normalization: Enable share awareness normlization

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, this disables normalizations that may yield blow-up on the bit-level.

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable

para.bold: Preprocessing: Variable substitution: Bit-Vector Inequality Normalization

detaileddescription.para:
Values:
1: enable [default]
0: disable
**Debug: Threshold for number of new nodes introduced for recursive call of rewrite(). **
Prints a warning number of newly introduced nodes is above threshold.

simplesect.para: This is an expert debug option.

detaileddescription.para: **Debug: Threshold for formula size increase after preprocessing in percent. **
Prints a warning if formula size increase is above threshold.

simplesect.para: This is an expert debug option.

detaileddescription.para: **Debug: Check models for each satisfiable query. **

simplesect.para: This is an expert debug option.

detaileddescription.para: **Debug: Check unsat core for each unsatisfiable query. **

simplesect.para: This is an expert debug option.

detaileddescription.para: The configuration options supported by Bitwuzla.
Options that list string values can be configured via bitwuzla_set_option_str. Options with integer configuration values are configured via bitwuzla_set_option.

For all options, the current configuration value can be queried via bitwuzla_get_option. Options with string configuration values internally represent these values as enum values. For these options, bitwuzla_get_opiton will return such an enum value. Use bitwuzla_get_option_str to query enum options for the corresponding string representation.
